title: FlowAnalytics
description: Navigation funnel monitoring construct that tracks conversion progression, drop-off rates, and goal completion across a NavigationFlow. Provides observability into user journey execution.

navigationFlowRef.description: Reference to the NavigationFlow (navigation layer) being monitored.

funnelMetrics.description: Metric instrument name or specification capturing funnel step completion rates.

conversionGoal.description: Identifier of the final step or outcome that defines a successful funnel conversion.

dropoffAlerts.description: Alert rule or threshold definition for detecting abnormal drop-off at any funnel step.
